cms.query.QueryText: SELECT SKUCategory.CategoryID AS OptionCategoryID, ISNULL(SKUCategory.AllowAllOptions, 1) AS AllowAllOptions, COUNT(SelectedOptions.OptionSKUID) AS SelectedOptions, COUNT(AllOptions.SKUID) AS AllOptions FROM COM_SKU AS AllOptions LEFT JOIN COM_SKUAllowedOption AS SelectedOptions ON SelectedOptions.OptionSKUID = AllOptions.SKUID AND SelectedOptions.SKUID = @SKUID LEFT JOIN COM_SKUOptionCategory AS SKUCategory ON AllOptions.SKUOptionCategoryID = SKUCategory.CategoryID WHERE SKUCategory.SKUID = @SKUID AND (SelectedOptions.SKUID = @SKUID OR SelectedOptions.SKUID IS NULL) AND ##WHERE## GROUP BY SKUCategory.CategoryID, SKUCategory.AllowAllOptions
